 3:     namespace UserApp\Http;

 5:     use \stdClass;
 6: 
 7:     class FakeTransport implements ITransport {
 8:         public function request($method, $url, $headers = null, $body = null){
 9:             echo(sprintf("Sending request %s %s with headers %s and body %s", $method, $url, $headers, $body));
10: 
11:             $response = new Response();
12: 
13:             $status = new stdClass();
14:             $status->protocol = "HTTP/1.FAKE";
15:             $status->code = 200;
16:             $status->message = "OK";
17: 
18:             $response->status = $status;
19:             $response->headers = array("Content-Type" => "application/json");
20:             $response->body = json_encode(array("error_code" => "FAKE_RESULT", "message" => "This is a fake result."));
21: 
22:             return $response;
23:         }
24:     }
